text_block_list.text: ――Tomorrow is the day Matikanetannhauser has an interview.
Thinking I should at least have a quick meeting, I enter the trainer's room――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ――Mackerel can!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
………….
Haa, crab can, squid can, curry can……!
Sixth sense, gut feeling, battleship……!

……Matikanetannhauser is single-mindedly chanting what seems to be a mysterious incantation.
And――for some reason, in her racing outfit.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Trainer!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoops～sorry. I'm in the middle of something important.
I was chanting a spell to help me focus.
choice_data_list: A spell to help you focus……?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
See, I have an interview tomorrow, right?
To prepare, I picked up some fresh, recommended focus methods～.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alright～, next focus method is……calligraphy!!
I'll go get the ink and paper!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Mufufu, 'Righteous Judgment Unification' 'Ikkyu Soul Infusion'!
I think I wrote some pretty good characters!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Mmm……here it comes, here it comes!
The focus power is surging up from within my body～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That earlier spell and this calligraphy are both focus methods I learned for today.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I have to report the interview's success as a souvenir for my two masters～.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah yeah, I'm starting to get a feel for the real thing.
Questions that are sure to come are, 'What's your favorite food?'
'Are you a dog or cat person?' and such.
choice_data_list: ……Is the racing outfit also part of the focus method?
……Is the racing outfit also part of the focus method?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yes!
This is a focus method I came up with myself.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
……This racing outfit, you see.
It gives me the most courage,
you could say it's a special item.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Because……this racing outfit is proof that
'ordinary' me took a step forward!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
――When I came to the academy, I decided. I'm
a 'normal girl' who got in by luck, but
I won't lose to anyone in effort!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
……But still, no matter how hard I tried,
I thought I'd probably stay 'ordinary'～.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
However……something 'not ordinary'
happened!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
A racing uniform is proof that you can run in G1 races.
In other words... it means you've achieved something...
that's not 'ordinary,' right!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, I was really happy, you know!
I called my family back home, and right after receiving it,
I even sent a selfie to my local friends--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
--Hehe. Well, getting a racing uniform,
just like getting into the academy, is probably
just a pile of luck, I think.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But luck is really important, you know.
Just like Fukuchan-senpai always says.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The luck of making lots of friends to work hard with.
The luck of being able to run with amazing girls and
feeling like I want to work even harder.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
And, above all...
The luck of meeting you, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh, thank you!
Ahh, even though I brought it up myself,
I'm getting a little embarrassed~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Well~, anyway. So, like that,
I'll get super not-ordinary power from my racing uniform too!
I'll go ace that interview tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes! Of course, of course!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ooh~! I've been infused with
Trainer's special cheering power!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
You're absolutely right, tomorrow
I'll go in special mode for sure!
It's a promise between O-Machi-chan and you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Pinky swear,
If I lie, I'll eat a sea urchin~!

Her spirit was full, her focus perfect... And so,
Matikanetannhauser was able to take on the interview
in perfect condition.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, let's do it!
Then for the cheer, let's do the usual one!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alright... I'll do my best at tomorrow's interview~!
Shoo~...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmph!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
And~! From now on in races too~!
All of them~! I'll do my best~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmmmph!!!!
